channel.title: Comments on: PIC18LF2550 Wireless 3-axis Accelerometer
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.title: By: bitu
item.dc:creator: bitu
item.description: hiii.... Steve, i m Mp cheema from india(punjab). i wan to implement a wireless video camera on a spy robo by using pic18lf2550. Actually, i wan 2 display the picture cought in da camera on computer's display unit. Can u please help me in codin pic contrller???
item.content:encoded: hiii…. Steve, i m Mp cheema from india(punjab). i wan to implement a wireless video camera on a spy robo by using pic18lf2550. Actually, i wan 2 display the picture cought in da camera on computer’s display unit. Can u please help me in codin pic contrller???

item.title: By: Henry Prieto
item.dc:creator: Henry Prieto
item.description:
Hi Steve, I want to implement a vibration monitoring system using a PIC18F microcontroller. I'm almost new to this and I was hoping how could you help me. I only have acces to 2 accelerometers here in my country, the Analog Devices ADXL321 and the MEMSIC2125 from PARALLAX. Which would be better suited for vibration monitoring in rotating machines with speed up to 5000 rpm. Thanks in advance
Henry Prieto
item.content:encoded:
Hi Steve, I want to implement a vibration monitoring system using a PIC18F microcontroller. I’m almost new to this and I was hoping how could you help me. I only have acces to 2 accelerometers here in my country, the Analog Devices ADXL321 and the MEMSIC2125 from PARALLAX. Which would be better suited for vibration monitoring in rotating machines with speed up to 5000 rpm. Thanks in advance

Henry Prieto

item.title: By: dojaja
item.dc:creator: dojaja
item.description:
hi, i've a totally newbie question: can you send and receive 3 simoultaneous and independent streams of data of the 3 accelerometers, with just one transmitter ? or the stream transmitted is just one (and the the transmission is something like : (read and stream accelerometer x, for 1 ms; read and stream accelerometer y, for 1 ms; read and stream accelerometer z, for 1 ms; start again) ?
(i confess i didn'tread the code)
Have a nice day!
item.content:encoded:
hi,
i’ve a totally newbie question:
can you send and receive 3 simoultaneous and independent streams of data of the 3 accelerometers, with just one transmitter ? or the stream transmitted is just one (and the the transmission is something like : (read and stream accelerometer x, for 1 ms; read and stream accelerometer y, for 1 ms; read and stream accelerometer z, for 1 ms; start again) ?

(i confess i didn’tread the code)

Have a nice day!

item.title: By: Kevin Ganess
item.dc:creator: Kevin Ganess
item.description:
Hi,
I am working on a project involving detecting the overall fluctuation in conditions of a shipping container on the high seas. The data has to be viewed real-time or minutely averaged. What kind of software would maximise my data being received. Would a software to Hardware interface be inferior to a software to software to hardware interface. Would satelite feed be better than GSM.
Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I am working on a project involving detecting the overall fluctuation in conditions of a shipping container on the high seas.
The data has to be viewed real-time or minutely averaged.
What kind of software would maximise my data being received.
Would a software to Hardware interface be inferior to a software to software to hardware interface. Would satelite feed be better than GSM.

Thanks.
